column1: Topic title: Activists slam Wan Azizah over support for Erdogan

column8: text

http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/379644Activists slam Wan Azizah over support for ErdoganAnnabelle Lee & Yap Jia Hee     19 April 2017Civil society leaders today condemned PKR president Dr Wan Azizah Wan Ismail's congratulatory message to Turkish Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan for winning a referendum to grant him more executive powers.Lawyers for Liberty executive director Eric Paulsen said the message was "quite unnecessary" as the Erdogan leadership is not democratic."Turkey under Erdogan can hardly be described as 'democratic'. How many journalists, cartoonists, academicians, writers, judges and politicians are under politically-motivated detention in Turkey right now?" he asked in a tweet.This was echoed by Center to Combat Corruption and Cronyism (C4) executive director Cynthia Gabriel."Indeed a very questionable position for an opposition leader to take," Cynthia said in a tweet...For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year (full news access)or RM420 a year (full news + full archive access). If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
why she need to congratulate erdogan? erdogan has nothing to do with her and whatever her business is.erdogan is full of controversies which will draw unnecessary bullets such as this critic
So many world leaders congratulates Najib back then too. Try harder freaking troopers. Just a Samsung A9 Pro or a Dell Optiplex dedak will get you no where.
Who are you referring to?
Coz her  husband is Erdogan's BFF
I meant the 'activists'
erdogan = crazy maniac
I don't understand.Congratulatory message means support?Are we not allowed to be nice?
Do you know what the activists have been doing all this while?  Go google their names.
Haven't you heard that Anwaristas (Team Anwar) are often called by the other name as Malaysian Erdoganistas.
The most pro democratic country invaded democratic country.
Well people say it is the end of democratic Turkey, end of the foundation laid by Ataturk.  Worthy of a congratulatory message?
Troopers? You referring to which troopers?
Well I don't know much about whoever those people are.But one thing I do know is that I'll congratulate you if you win a new car, even if I dislike you.
If Trump deserve it, I guess so do Erogan and the Turkish people who democratically made it possible.
The ppl of turkey has spoken we should respect that.
Don't underestimate the power of dedak. The biggest anti democracy is happening in Malaysia but did nothing, why choose to attack a person's goodwill message instead?
Ah....I see.But this is not like winning a new car.  The win comes at a cost somewhere to the detriment of many.
He condemn muslims, jakim n friday sermons
lol even in PAS previously also got so called Erdogan team.... which eventually kena kick out and make PAN.
Yes I understand that, but the people of their country has spoken.And on a side note, even though Trump is hated, he still won.That means that there's something that unites them doesn't it?

So far I see no evidence of dedak.  You mean you think they makan dedak because they are critical of Azizah over this?  Did you google their names?  Eric Paulsen has been charged with sedition.  http://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2015...aulsen-charged/He is also Ambiga's lawyer.  http://www.themalaymailonline.com/malaysia...e-heard-tuesdayCynthia Gabriel of C4.  Very vocal on various issues.  They have been pursuing the Perimekar/Scorpene case.  Both have been critical of so many things happening in Malaysia.  They surely did not do nothing as you claim.  See my earlier post about the "goodwill message".
US is still as split as ever. Turkey too it seems.  The opposition are challenging the results.
Yes, the Turkish people have spoken.  But doesn't mean Azizah has to congratulate him.
Nothing we can do here.I wish them good luck.And by that I don't means that I support their fighting, lest I get attacked like azizah.
Hope you remember RPK. Anything is possible.Opposition is no angel but there are way more important things to pick on other than horse shit dedak inspired story like this.
Too bad pakatan cybertroopers can't see the fact that erdogan is a authoritarian that is even worse than bijan.Come at me bro.
spanish teacher so sad now..rilex liao...dapiq still strong.. we still leader of the pack...
LOL  You still on the Spanish teacher?  I no sad.  I always rileklah.  I am probably more of a PKR supporter than a DAP supporter......

Why not? It is her own choice, perhaps? Even Lim Kit Siang congratulates the late Adenan Satem when BN won Sarawak last year. Even Lim Guan Eng congratulates the PAP outsiders when the latter won the hearts of majority Singaporeans~
why not pan? party bunga bersatu? pkr no supporter now... most of them go to pas liao...
The goodwill message turned Wan Azizah and whole Pakatan same as Erdogan. I think your troopership needs more training before entitle for any dedak

Hmm...you should understand what I meant when I said she didn't need to congratulate him.  Yes, it is her choice.  She can congratulate him.  But she didn't need to......Why compare those with this as if it is the same thing?
Same reason as why you support who you support?   Or your favourite football team.
Just following on what others were conveying.  I was more on the congratulatory message which I still believe Azizah didn't need to send......

In politics you are judged by every action that you take whether be it personal or not because you represent your party. To say that pakatan is equal to erdogan is extreme but it doesn't help them in any possible way.It's funny to see that people are blinded by this fact because it is the opposition which can do no wrong.
Yeah quite weird. If Najib say I can understand. But anyway, Turkey is changing their system to becoming more like Malaysia and Singapore. Not the best.
All those three were congratulating the success of democratic process being carried out legally and peacefully~Still not the same?

See what they are congratulating lor.  Like what the article says........Lawyers for Liberty executive director Eric Paulsen said the message was "quite unnecessary" as the Erdogan leadership is not democratic."Turkey under Erdogan can hardly be described as 'democratic'. How many journalists, cartoonists, academicians, writers, judges and politicians are under politically-motivated detention in Turkey right now?" he asked in a tweet.
Your master and his cronies can do infinite scandals, controversies, shits, killings, abuses and all.And the opposition must be better than god himself.Ambik ni dedak, since you are so desperate.
Reminds me of our down-south neighbour~ no different in actions - just numbers.
SG been doing much of that in recent times, when LGE sent congratulatory messages?I hear it is still happening in Turkey.
Amos Yee happened in 2015 the same year LGE congratulated PAP. "The Real Singapore"~ Again~no different in actions, just numbers~

"Indeed a very questionable position for an opposition leader to take," Cynthia said in a tweet... Why would it be weird? Opposition leader would not want more executive powers?Especially one that gain prominence because she's wife of that party leader.
Why?  Amos Yee didn't do anything wrong?
Isn't it all the more reason for them to avoid that shit linking?
u walaunta team?
Don't forget "The Real Singapore" as well~IIRC, Anwaristas regarded being called Erdoganistas as a compliment.waladapan team~ no believe arrr?
Same question as the one for Amos Yee.
dah dahssshhhhhhhhhdun spread nanti lose votes pula
nyanuk house wife
in fb when failed military coupall congratulate erdogan as pejuang agama
Yes saladin People there vote more than one time And ballot without official stamp is allowedDemocracy at its best

why? No need to congratulate also i can see their hardcore supporters spamming support in fb supporting erdogan like a plague. The congratulation is a relatively non-issue. I thought ppl here always say why bother about other country when we are in shambles. Suddenly care so much about turkey.

Long time no see, richard~The possibility of fraud is there indeed, could be true since Donald Trump even congratulated Erdogan over the phone~ This is one awesome intriguing political bed-time story. Kak Wan, DSAI, Erdogan, EU, and Trump~ ahhh all the fun characters.
Yes saladinThat make it quite an orgy don't you think
Nice orgy for those characters~ not so nice against their conflicting fans. LOVELY~So richard, guess BN will reap the game again aye~
Yes saladinI guess soBut ayam happy as long as pas lose all seats like Sarawak election So heart warming man
No problemo, richard~ All Is Well~

column7: From: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
column8: Alamak. Erdogan is another Assad in the making, and she go an congratulate him.

the problem is why she congrats others that person go kecoh , she like to congrats who she like lah , she watch foot ball MU win she congrats Murinoh also this makan dedak activist will kecoh wan.orang bercintan pak tor they snap photo kecoh, orang sini ucap congrats here also kecoh wanna respond to master call to attack also find some better trick lah
Donald trump is unpopular globally but why world leaders still congratulate him??
You need to ask?

It's true, Amos Yee certainly did not break the law. There's something called freedom of speech.Although what he said is definitely should be frowned upon, but to punish that with an actual form of physical punishment is definitely wrong.Said someone insults others, which caused him to be fired from his job or expelled from school. That's ok.But to impose fine, jailing or beat him up, that's wrong. There's line to such matter.
You guys certainly are rare kind of open minded people in Malaysia.The kind of hardcore support over opposition almost bring them to the same level as our dictactor party.

The Singapore courts convicted him - The court found Yee guilty and convicted him of both charges on 12 May 2015. With regards to the obscenity charge, judge Jasvender Kaur said that "standards of obscenity will change from time to time", and differ among countries, and that "it was up to the courts to decide based on community standards." Kaur considered the effect that image had on teenagers, and concluded that it met the "strongest possible disapproval and condemnation". With regards to the second charge on making remarks intending to hurt the feelings of Christians, Kaur said that Yee's remarks were "clearly derogatory and offensive to Christians".He can't hide behind freedom of speech.

That's why. Singapore is no better than us when it comes to that.If someone gathered enough hate from the public, he will be persecuted so that the government continue to gain support.Same things happened here.

I don't think the SG governments need to make use of him to gain more support.   He could have made all those videos (while still critical of LKY) without making all those obscene remarks and also bringing religion into it.  But he chose not to. What goes around, comes around.

Well, there's a lot of insult to donald trump done by those celebrities.Non of them were thrown in jail. And their insults were far more personal.People won't care, our mob mentality is too strong.It's wrong, but when everyone agree to it, it is ok to do so.
US lain, SG lain.  MY pun lain.
Yeah, expected. That's what everyone said when I pointed that out.That's why we don't need to improve, it's just too hard.
Why?  Is the USA the ideal?  Something all countries should aspire to?
